column1: Kata Robata////I was at Kata Robata for a birthday dinner. We allowed the waiter to pick our dishes
column2: which was fun enough. One of the dishes was a seaweed salad. It was quite nice
column3: but the portion size was very small. It's the amount of food that makes you think that everyone around you is judging you for being so pretentious - oh look at him
column4: not eating fish at a sushi place and eating such a small plate blah blah blah - but then you realize you're paying $60 for four-ish dishes and suddenly you realize how right everyone's judgments are.
